Scale Settings

Related

Accoutrement Scale [external]

$modular-scale

scss 
$modular-scale: (
  'text-ratio': 1.4,
);

Ratio text-ratio (1.4)

Step Value
-3 0.36
 
-2 0.51
 
-1 0.71
 
— base
 
1 1.4
 
2 1.96
 
3 2.74
 

$text-sizes

scss 
$text-sizes: (
  'root': 18px,
  'responsive': 'calc(#root + 0.5vw)',
  'code': 0.875em,
  'large': 1rem
    (
      'text-ratio': 1,
    ),
  'xlarge': 'calc(#large + 2vw)',
  'xxlarge': 'calc(#xlarge + 2vw)',
  'small': 1rem
    (
      'text-ratio': -0.5,
    ),
  'xsmall': 1rem
    (
      'text-ratio': -1,
    ),
);

Size Previews

Name Value
root 18px Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
responsive calc(18px + 0.5vw) Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
code 0.875em Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
large 1.4rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
xlarge calc(1.4rem + 2vw) Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
xxlarge calc(calc(1.4rem + 2vw) + 2vw) Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
small 0.8451542547rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
xsmall 0.7142857143rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.

$spacing-sizes

scss 
$spacing-sizes: (
  'rhythm': '#root'
    (
      'text-ratio': 1,
      'convert-units': 'rem',
    ),
  'gutter': '#rhythm',
  'double-gutter': '#gutter'
    (
      'times': 2,
    ),
  'spacer': calc(%s + %s)
    (
      '%s': '#gutter' 4vmin,
    ),
  'shim': '#gutter'
    (
      'times': 0.5,
    ),
  'half-shim': '#shim'
    (
      'times': 0.5,
    ),
  'quarter-shim': '#shim'
    (
      'times': 0.25,
    ),
);

Size Previews

Name Value
rhythm, gutter 1.4rem
 
double-gutter 2.8rem
 
spacer calc(1.4rem + 4vmin)
 
shim 0.7rem
 
half-shim 0.35rem
 
quarter-shim 0.175rem
 

$component-sizes

scss 
$component-sizes: (
  'icon': 1em,
  'section-border': '#half-shim',
);

Size Previews

Name Value
icon 1em
 
section-border 0.35rem
 

$page-sizes

scss 
$page-sizes: (
  'page': 42rem,
  'half': '#page'
    (
      'divide': 2,
    ),
  'quarter': '#page'
    (
      'divide': 4,
    ),
);

Size Previews

Name Value
page 42rem
 
half 21rem
 
quarter 10.5rem
 

$breakpoints

scss 
$breakpoints: (
  'page-break': '#page'
    (
      'convert-units': 'browser-ems',
    ),
  'wide': '#page-break'
    (
      'times': 1.5,
    ),
);
